en: 1 Blessed be the Lord God of Israel
en_context: for he hath visited and redeemed his people;
xh: 1 Mayibongwe iNkosi uThixo kaSirayeli: ngokuba ibavelele yabakhulula ngentlawulelo abantu bayo.

en: 2 And hath raised up a mighty salvation for us
en_context: in the house of his servant David;
xh: 2 Yasiphakamisela uphondo Iosindiso: endlwini kaDavide umkhonzi wayo.

en: 3 As he spake by the mouth of his holy Prophets
en_context: which have been since the world began;
xh: 3 Njengoko yathethayo ngomlomo wabangcwele, ababengabaprofite bayo kwasephakadeni:

en: 5 That we should be saved from our enemies : and from the hand of all that hate us.
xh: 3.5 usindiso lokusisindisa ezintshabeni zethu, nasesandleni sabo bonke abo abasithiyayo.

en: 4 To perform the mercy promised to our forefathers
en_context: and to remember his holy Covenant;
xh: 4 Ukubenzela inceba oobawo bethu: nokukhumbula umnqophiso wayo ongcwele.

en: 5 [To perform] the oath which he sware to our forefather Abraham
en_context: that he would give us; That we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies:
xh: 5 Isifungo eyasifungela uAbraham ubawo wethu: sokusinika ukuba sithi sihlangulwe esandleni seentshaba zethu.

en: 6 [That] we might serve him without fear; In holiness and righteousness before him
en_context: all the days of our life.
xh: 6 Siyikhonze singenakoyika: ngobungcwele nangobulungisa emehlweni ayo yonke imihla yobomi bethu.

en: 7 And thou, Child, shalt be called the Prophet of the Highest
en_context: for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways;
xh: 7 Nawe mntwana, uya kubizwa ngokuba ungumprofite wosenyangweni: kuba uya kuhamba phambi kobuso beNkosi ulungise iindlela zayo.

en: 8 To give knowledge of salvation unto his people
en_context: for the remission of their sins,
xh: 8 Ukuze ubanike abantu bayo ukwaziwa kosindiso: ngoxolelo Iwezono zabo.

en: 9 Through the tender mercy of our God
en_context: whereby the day-spring from on high hath visited us;
xh: 9 Ngenxa yenceba nemfesane yoThixo wethu: Othe ngaye wasivelela umso wasenyangweni.

en: 10 To give light to them that sit in darkness, and in the shadow of death
en_context: and to guide our feet into the way of peace.
xh: 10 Ukuba ukhanye kwabo bahleliyo ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa: nokuba uzingenise iinyawo zethu endleleni yoxolo.

en: Glory [be] to the Father, and to the Son
en_context: and to the Holy Ghost;
xh: Uzuko kuYise nakuNyana: nakuMoya oyiNgcwele.

en: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be
en_context: world without end. Amen.
xh: Kwavela kunjalo kusenjalo nanamhla: kohlala kunjalo ngonaphakade. Amen

en: Song of Zechariah
xh: iNgoma kaZekariya

en: 1 Our Father, which art in heaven,
xh: 1 Bawo wethu osezulwini

en: 2 Hallowed be thy Name,
xh: 2 Malingcwaliswe igama lakho

en: 3 Thy kingdom come,
xh: 3 Mabufike ubukumkani bakho

en: 4 Thy will be done, in earth as it is in heaven.
xh: 4 Mayenziwe intando yakho emhlabeni njengasezulwini.

en: 5 Give us this day our daily bread;
xh: 5 Siphe namhlanje isonka sethu semihla ngemihla.

en: 6 And forgive us our trespasses,
xh: 6 Usixolele izono zethu

en: 7 As we forgive them that trespass against us;
xh: 7 njengokuba nathi sibaxolela abo basonayo.

en: 8 And lead us not into temptation,
xh: 8 Ungasiyekeli ekulingweni

en: 9 But deliver us from evil.
xh: 9 koko sisindise enkohlakalweni.

en: 10 For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory,
xh: 10 Ngokuba bobakho ubukumkani, namandla, nozuko

en: 11 For ever and ever. Amen.
xh: 11 ngoku nangonaphakade. Amen

en: 1 Come, let us sing unto the Lord
en_context: let us heartily rejoice in the strength of our salvation
xh: 1 Yizani, siculele iNkosi: sigcobele kwiliwa losindiso lwethu

en: 2 Let us come before him with thanksgiving
en_context: and let us rejoice in him with psalms.
xh: 2 Masize phambi kwayo sinombulelo: sigcobele kuyo ngamaculo.

en: 3 For the Lord is a great God
en_context: he is the great King above all gods
xh: 3 Ngokuba iNkosi inguThixo omkhulu: inguKumkani omkhulu phezu kwabo bonke oothixo.

en: 4 The ends of the earth are in his hand
en_context: and the peaks of the mountains are his
xh: 4 Iziphelo zehlabathi zisesandleni sakhe: neenchopo zeentaba zezakhe.

en: 5 The sea is his, and he made it
en_context: and his hands formed the dry land
xh: 5 Ulwandle lolwakhe, walwenza: nezandla zakhe zawubumba umhlaba owomileyo.

en: 6 Come all, let us prostrate [ourselves] and fall down
en_context: and kneel before the Lord our creator.
xh: 6 Yizani, siqubude siwe phantsi: siguqe phambi kweNkosi umDali wethu.

en: 7 For he is the Lord our God
en_context: as for us, we are the people of his pasture; we are the sheep of his hand
xh: 7 Ngokuba yena uyiNkosi uThixo wethu: thina ke singabantu bedlelo lakhe, sizigusha zesandla sakhe.

en: 8 Today if you can hear his voice, do not make your hearts stubborn
en_context: as in the day of provocation, "the day you tempted me in the wilderness.
xh: 8 Namhla ukuba ninokuliva izwi lakhe, musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu: njengomhla wempikiswano, mini nandilingayo entlango;

en: 9 When your [fore]fathers tempted me
en_context: put me to the test, and saw my works
xh: 9 Oko bandilingayo ooyihlo: bandicikida, bayibona imisebenzi yam.

en: 10 Fourty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said
en_context: it is a people who do err in their hearts; they have not known my ways
xh: 10 Iminyaka emashumi mane ndarhuquka sesi sizukulwana, ndathi: Ngabantu abaphambukayo ngeentliziyo, abazazi iindlela zam;

en: 11 I eventually made an oath about them in my anger, and said
en_context: they will not enter into my rest"
xh: 11 Ndada ndabafungela ndinomsindo, ndathi: abasayi kungena ekuphumleni kwam.

en: 1 You are God, we praise thee
en_context: we acknowledge thee that you are the Lord.
xh: 1 UnguThixo siyakubonga: uyiNkosi siyakuvuma.

en: 2 You are the Father everlasting
en_context: all creation worships thee
xh: 2 UnguBawo ongunaphakade: yonke indalo inqula wena.

en: 3 To thee all angels and all the powers in heaven
en_context: the Cherubin and Seraphin sing praise unending
xh: 3 Kuwe zonke iingelosi nawo onke amandla asezulwini: iiKerubhi neeSerafi zicula umbongo ongapheliyo.

en: 4 Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God of hosts and might
en_context: Heaven and earth are full of thy glorious Majesty
xh: 4 Ngcwele, ngcwele, ngcwele Nkosi Thixo wemikhosi namandla: lizele izulu nomhlaba bubuqaqawuli bakho.

en: 5 The glorious company of the Apostles praise thee
en_context: the goodly fellowship of the Prophets praise thee, the noble army of Martyrs praise thee
xh: 5 lbutho elizukileyo labapostile libonga wena: ubudleIane obuhle babaprofite bubonga wena, umkhosi wabafeli onesidima ubonga wena.

en: 6 The holy Church over all [the world] doth acknowledge thee
en_context: the Father of an infinite majesty.
xh: 6 IKerike engcwele ekulo lonke ivuma wena: Bawo Obungangamsha bungaphelendawo.

en: 7 Thine true and only Son, who ought to be worshipped
en_context: and the Holy Ghost: the comforter and guide.
xh: 7 UNyana wakho wenene okuphela kwakhe ofanele ukunqulwa: noMoya oyiNgcwele onguMthetheleli nomkhokeli.

en: 8 Thou O Christ art the King of Glory
en_context: the everlasting Son of the Father.
xh: 8 Wena Krestu unguKumkani wozuko: uNyana waphakade kaYise.

en: 9 When thou became human in order to deliver us
en_context: thou didst not abhor the Virgin's womb.
xh: 9 Wathi wakuba ngumntu ukuza kusikhulula: akwasidela isizalo seNtombi.

en: 10 Thou didst overcome the sharpness of death
en_context: thou didst open for all believers the kingdom of heaven.
xh: 10 Walweyisa ulwamvila lokufa: wabuvulela onke amakholwa ubukumkani bezulu.

en: 11 Thou sittest at the right hand of God in glorious majesty
en_context: we believe that thou shalt come to be our Judge.
xh: 11 Uhleli ngasekunene kukaThixo ebuqaqawulini: siyakholwa ukuba uyakuza ube nguMgwebi wethu.

en: 12 Come then Lord, and help thy people
en_context: who are purchased by the worthy price of thy blood.
xh: 12 Yiza ke Nkosi uncede abantu bakho: abathengwe ngexabiso leGazi lakho.

en: 13 Make us enter, along with thy Saints
en_context: into Glory that cannot end.
xh: 13 Singenise kunye nabangcwele bakho: ebuqaqawulini obungenakuphela.

en: 14 Save thy people, O Lord, and bless thine heritage
en_context: govern them, and lift them up until eternity.
xh: 14 Sindisa abantu bakho Nkosi, ulisikelele ilifa lakho: balawule ubaphakamise kude kube ngunaphakade.

en: 15 Day by day, we magnify thee
en_context: we praise thy Name, ever world without end.
xh: 15 Imihla ngemihla siyakudumisa: sibonga iGama lakho ngonaphakade

en: 16 Keep us this day, Lord, from all sin
en_context: have mercy upon us, O Lord, have mercy upon us.
xh: 16: Sigcine ngale mini Nkosi kuso sonke isono: Senzele inceba, Nkosi, senzele inceba.

en: 17 Lord show us thy love and mercy
en_context: for we trust in thee.
xh: 17: Nkosi sibonise uthando Iwakho nenceba: ngokuba sithembele kuwe.

en: 18 Lord, in thee do we trust
en_context: may we not be disappointed.
xh: 18: Nkosi sithembele kuwe: masingaze sidaniswe.

en: 1 I believe in God the Father Almighty, creator of heaven and earth
xh: 1 Ndiyakholwa kuThixo, uYise ongamandla onke umdali wezulu nomhlaba.

en: 2 I believe in Jesus Christ his only Son our Lord
xh: 2 Ndiyakholwa kuYesu Krestu, okuphela koNyana wakhe iNkosi yethu.

en: 3 Who was conceived by the Holy Ghost,
xh: 3 Owakhawulwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

en: 4 Born of the Virgin Mary
xh: 4 Wazalwa yiNtombi uMariya.

en: 5 Suffered under Pontius Pilate
xh: 5 Weva iintlungu ngemihla kaPontiyo Pilato

en: 6 Was crucified, dead, and buried
xh: 6 wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa, wangcwatywa.

en: 7 He descended to the dead
xh: 7 Wehlela kwelabafileyo

en: 8 The third day he rose from the dead;
xh: 8 Wathi ngomhla wesithathu wavuka kwelabafileyo.

en: 9 He ascended into heaven
xh: 9 Waza wenyukela ezulwini

en: 10 And sitteth on the right hand of God the Father
xh: 10 uhleli ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise.

en: 11 From thence he shall come to judge the living and the dead.
xh: 11 Apho aya kuvela khona aze kugweba abahleliyo nabafileyo.

en: 12 I believe in the Holy Ghost
xh: 12 Ndiyakholwa kuMoya oyiNgcwele

en: 13 in the holy Catholick Church
xh: 13 kwiKerike engcwele ekhatolika

en: 14 the Communion of Saints [the Holy ones]
xh: 14 ubudlelane babangcwele

en: 15 in the Forgiveness of sins
xh: 15 kuxolelo Iwezono

en: 16 in the Resurrection of the body
xh: 16 kukuvuka komzimba ekufeni

en: 17 And in [it] the Life everlasting. Amen.
xh: 17 nakubo ubomi obungunaphakade. Amen.

deck: Xhosa Texts::Prayer of repentance and mercy
en: 1 Almighty God, our Father who is in heaven
xh: 1 Thixo ongamandla onke, Bawo wethu wasezulwini

deck: Xhosa Texts::Prayer of repentance and mercy
en: 2 We repent, acknowledging that we have sinned against you through a debt that is our own
en_context: through thinking, speaking and doing, and through that which we might not have done.
xh: 2 siyaguquka sivuma ukuba sikonile ngetyala elilelethu, ngokucinga, ngokuthetha, nangokwenza, nangako esithe asakwenza.

deck: Xhosa Texts::Prayer of repentance and mercy
en: 3 Because of your Son, Christ our Lord, forgive us all that is passed
xh: 3 Ngenxa yoNyana wakho, uKrestu iNkosi yethu, sixolele konke okudlulileyo

deck: Xhosa Texts::Prayer of repentance and mercy
en: 4 Make that we would serve you in new life, to the glorification [of] your Name.
xh: 4 Wenze ukuba sikukhonze ngentlalo entsha, kuzukiswe iGama lakho.

en: Almighty God, our Father who is in heaven, We repent, acknowledging that we have sinned against you, in thinking, speaking and doing, and in that which we have not done. Because of your Son, Christ our Lord, forgive us all that is passed. Make that we would serve you in new life, to the glorification [of] your Name.
xh: Thixo ongamandla onke, Bawo wethu wasezulwini: siyaguquka sivuma ukuba sikonile ngetyala elilelethu, ngokucinga, ngokuthetha, nangokwenza, nangako esithe asakwenza. Ngenxa yoNyana wakho, uKrestu iNkosi yethu, sixolele konke okudlulileyo, wenze ukuba sikukhonze ngentlalo entsha, kuzukiswe iGama lakho.

en: May God Almighty be merciful to us, and forgive our sins, and preserve us in life everlasting; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
xh: UThixo ongamandla onke, makabe nenceba kuthi, asixolele izono zethu, asigcine ebomini obungunaphakade; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen

en: 1 May to you be praise and respect and gratitude and glory
xh: 1 Makubekho umbongo nembeko nombulelo nozuko

en: 2 more than we can speak of you
xh: 2 ngaphezu kwesinokukuthetha

en: 3 more than we can comprehend about you
xh: 3 ngaphezu kwesinokukuqiqa

en: 4 to you, glorious Holy Trinity
en_context: Father, Son and Holy Spirit
xh: 4 kuwe, MTriniti oNgcwele ozukileyo: Yise, Nyana noMoya oyiNgcwele

en: 5 Be given by all angels; all people; all creatures
en_context: world without end.
xh: 5 zinikwa ziingelosi zonke; ngabantu bonke; zizidalwa zonke: kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.

en: May to you be praise and respect and gratitude and glory, more than we can speak of you, more than we can comprehend about you; to you, glorious Holy Trinity
en_context: Father, Son and Holy Spirit, may these be given by all angels; all people; all creatures, world without end.
xh: Makubekho umbongo nembeko nombulelo nozuko, ngaphezu kwesinokukuthetha, ngaphezu kwesinokukuqiqa, kuwe - MTriniti oNgcwele ozukileyo: Yise, Nyana noMoya oyiNgcwele - zinikwa ziingelosi zonke; ngabantu bonke; zizidalwa zonke, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.

en: 1 Eternal and almighty Father
xh: 1 Bawo waphakade ongamandla onke

en: 2 You have preserved us to the beginning of this day
xh: 2 usilondolozile kwada kwasa ngale mini:

en: 3 Protect us through your great power
xh: 3 sikhusele ngamandla akho amakhulu

en: 4 so that we would be free from all sin
xh: 4 ukuze sikhululeke kuso sonke isono

en: 5 and would not enter any kind of danger
xh: 5 singangeni nakuluphi na uhlobo lwengozi

en: 6 May you make us today that our actions would be governed by you
xh: 6 Usenze namhlanje ukuba izenzo zethu zilawulwe nguwe

en: 7 [so that] we would live, doing rightly in your eyes; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
xh: 7 sihlale sisenza okulungileyo emehlweni akho; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen

en: Eternal and almighty Father, You have preserved us to the beginning of this day, Protect us through your great power, so that we would be free from all sin, and would not enter any kind of danger, May you make us today that our actions would be governed by you, [so that] we would live, doing rightly in your eyes, through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
xh: Bawo waphakade ongamandla onke, usilondolozile kwada kwasa ngale mini: sikhusele ngamandla akho amakhulu ukuze sikhululeke kuso sonke isono, singangeni nakuluphi na uhlobo lwengozi. Usenze namhlanje ukuba izenzo zethu zilawulwe nguwe sihlale sisenza okulungileyo emehlweni akho; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: O God who art the author of peace and lover of concord, knowing you is eternal life; serving you is perfect freedom
en_context: protect us your servants from all assault[s] of our enemies, in order that we would trust in your protection without fearing the enemies' power; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
xh: Thixo mbangi yoxolo nomthandi wemvisiswano, ukwazi wena bubomi baphakade, ukukhonza wena yinkululeko efezekileyo: sikhusele thina zicaka zakho kulo lonke uhlaselo lweentshaba zethu, ukuze sithemba ukhuselo lwakho singawoyiki amandla eentshaba; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: 1 Father in heaven, your Son promised that when we pray in his name you will hear us
xh: 1 Bawo osezulwini, uNyana wakho uthembise ukuba xa sithandaza egameni lakhe uyakusiva:

en: 2 Hear our prayers as it is exactly fitting for us
xh: 2 yiva imithandazo yethu njengoko kanye kusifaneleyo

en: 3 Give us who are in this world the knowledge of your truth
xh: 3 usiphe thina sisekweli phakade ulwazi Iwenyaniso yakho

en: 4 And in the one [world] to come the fulfilment of eternal life; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
xh: 4 nakwelizayo inzaliseko yobomi obungunaphakade; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: Father in heaven, your Son promised that when we pray in his name you will hear us
en_context: Hear our prayers just as it is exactly fitting for us. Give us who are in this world the knowledge of your truth, and in the one [world] to come the fulfilment of eternal life; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen
xh: Bawo osezulwini, uNyana wakho uthembise ukuba xa sithandaza egameni lakhe uyakusiva: yiva imithandazo yethu njengoko kanye kusifaneleyo, usiphe thina sisekweli phakade ulwazi Iwenyaniso yakho, nakwelizayo inzaliseko yobomi obungunaphakade; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: May the grace/favour of our Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit, be with us all eternally. Amen.
xh: Ubabalo IweNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, nothando lukaThixo, nodlelano loMoya oyiNgcwele, malube nathi sonke ngonaphakade. Amen

en: May the Lord bless us and keep us; may the Lord make his face to shine upon us and favour us; may he lift his countenance, the Lord, and give us peace.
xh: INkosi mayisisikelele isigcine; mayibukhanyise iNkosi ubuso bayo isibabale; mayibuphakamise ubuso bayo iNkosi isinike uxolo.

en: Umthandazo woMTriniti
xh: Makubekho umbongo nembeko nombulelo nozuko, ngaphezu kwesinokukuthetha, ngaphezu kwesinokukuqiqa, kuwe - MTriniti oNgcwele ozukileyo: Yise, Nyana noMoya oyiNgcwele - zinikwa ziingelosi zonke; ngabantu bonke; zizidalwa zonke, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.

en: Umthandazo womkhuselo ngale mini
xh: Bawo waphakade ongamandla onke, usilondolozile kwada kwasa ngale mini: sikhusele ngamandla akho amakhulu ukuze sikhululeke kuso sonke isono, singangeni nakuluphi na uhlobo lwengozi. Usenze namhlanje ukuba izenzo zethu zilawulwe nguwe sihlale sisenza okulungileyo emehlweni akho; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: Ubabalo (The Grace)
xh: Ubabalo IweNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, nothando lukaThixo, nodlelano loMoya oyiNgcwele, malube nathi sonke ngonaphakade. Amen

en: Intsikelelo yokugqibela
xh: UThixo ongamandla onke, makabe nenceba kuthi, asixolele izono zethu, asigcine ebomini obungunaphakade; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen

en: Umthandazo wenguquko, inceba nexolelo lwezono (2)
xh: 1 Thixo ongamandla onke, Bawo wethu wasezulwini: siyaguquka sivuma ukuba sikonile ngetyala elilelethu, ngokucinga, ngokuthetha, nangokwenza, nangako esithe asakwenza. Ngenxa yoNyana wakho, uKrestu iNkosi yethu, sixolele konke okudlulileyo, wenze ukuba sikukhonze ngentlalo entsha, kuzukiswe iGama lakho. 2 UThixo ongamandla onke, makabe nenceba kuthi, asixolele izono zethu, asigcine ebomini obungunaphakade; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen

en: Umthandazo wesithembiso sikaNyana
xh: Bawo osezulwini, uNyana wakho uthembise ukuba xa sithandaza egameni lakhe uyakusiva: yiva imithandazo yethu njengoko kanye kusifaneleyo, usiphe thina sisekweli phakade ulwazi Iwenyaniso yakho, nakwelizayo inzaliseko yobomi obungunaphakade; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: Umthandazo woxolo nemvisiswano
xh: Thixo mbangi yoxolo nomthandi wemvisiswano, ukwazi wena bubomi baphakade, ukukhonza wena yinkululeko efezekileyo: sikhusele thina zicaka zakho kulo lonke uhlaselo lweentshaba zethu, ukuze sithemba ukhuselo lwakho singawoyiki amandla eentshaba; ngoYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

en: Bawo Wethu (11)
xh: 1 Bawo wethu osezulwini 2 Malingcwaliswe igama lakho 3 Mabufike ubukumkani bakho 4 Mayenziwe intando yakho emhlabeni njengasezulwini. 5 Siphe namhlanje isonka sethu semihla ngemihla.6 Usixolele izono zethu 7 njengokuba nathi sibaxolela abo basonayo.  8 Ungasiyekeli ekulingweni  9 koko sisindise enkohlakalweni. 10 Ngokuba bobakho ubukumkani, namandla, nozuko  11 ngoku nangonaphakade. Amen

en: Isivumo sokholo sabapostile (17)
xh: 1 Ndiyakholwa kuThixo, u Yise ongamandla onke umdali wezulu nomhlaba. 2 Ndiyakholwa kuYesu Krestu, okuphela koNyana wakhe iNkosi yethu. 3 Owakhawulwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele 4 wazalwa yiNtombi uMariya. 5 Weva iintlungu ngemihla kaPontiyo Pilato 6 wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa, wangcwatywa. 7 Wehlela kwelabafileyo. 8 Wathi ngomhla wesithathu wavuka kwelabafileyo. 9 Waza wenyukela ezulwini 10 uhleli ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise. 11 Apho aya kuvela khona aze kugweba abahleliyo nabafileyo. 12 Ndiyakholwa kuMoya oyiNgcwele 13 kwiKerike engcwele ekhatolika 14 ubudlelane babangcwele 15 kuxolelo Iwezono 16 kukuvuka komzimba ekufeni 17 nakubo ubomi obungunaphakade. Amen

en: Te Deum
en_context: iculo leKerike elidala (18)
xh: 1 UnguThixo siyakubonga: uyiNkosi siyakuvuma. 2 UnguBawo ongunaphakade: yonke indalo inqula wena. 3 Kuwe zonke iingelosi nawo onke amandla asezulwini: iiKerubhi neeSerafi zicula umbongo ongapheliyo. 4 Ngcwele, ngcwele, ngcwele Nkosi Thixo wemikhosi namandla: lizele izulu nomhlaba bubuqaqawuli bakho. 5 lbutho elizukileyo labapostile libonga wena: ubudleIane obuhle babaprofite bubonga wena, umkhosi wabafeli onesidima ubonga wena.6 IKerike engcwele ekulo lonke ivuma wena: Bawo Obungangamsha bungaphelendawo. 7 UNyana wakho wenene okuphela kwakhe ofanele ukunqulwa: noMoya oyiNgcwele onguMthetheleli nomkhokeli. 8 Wena Krestu unguKumkani wozuko: uNyana waphakade kaYise. 9 Wathi wakuba ngumntu ukuza kusikhulula: akwasidela isizalo seNtombi. 10 Walweyisa ulwamvila lokufa: wabuvulela onke amakholwa ubukumkani bezulu. 11 Uhleli ngasekunene kukaThixo ebuqaqawulini: siyakholwa ukuba uyakuza ube nguMgwebi wethu. 12 Yiza ke Nkosi uncede abantu bakho: abathengwe ngexabiso leGazi lakho. 13 Singenise kunye nabangcwele bakho: ebuqaqawulini obungenakuphela. 14 Sindisa abantu bakho Nkosi, ulisikelele ilifa lakho: balawule ubaphakamise kude kube ngunaphakade. 15 Imihla ngemihla siyakudumisa: sibonga iGama lakho ngonaphakade. 16 Sigcine ngale mini Nkosi kuso sonke isono: Senzele inceba, Nkosi, senzele inceba. 17 Nkosi sibonise uthando Iwakho nenceba: ngokuba sithembele kuwe. 18 Nkosi sithembele kuwe: masingaze sidaniswe.

en: Indumiso 95
en_context: Yizani, siculele iNkosi (11) + Gloria (2)
xh: 1 Yizani, siculele iNkosi: sigcobele kwiliwa losindiso lwethu2 Masize phambi kwayo sinombulelo: sigcobele kuyo ngamaculo. 3 Ngokuba iNkosi inguThixo omkhulu: inguKumkani omkhulu phezu kwabo bonke oothixo. 4 Iziphelo zehlabathi zisesandleni sakhe: neenchopo zeentaba zezakhe. 5 Ulwandle lolwakhe, walwenza: nezandla zakhe zawubumba umhlaba owomileyo.6 Yizani, siqubude siwe phantsi: siguqe phambi kweNkosi umDali wethu. 7 Ngokuba yena uyiNkosi uThixo wethu: thina ke singabantu bedlelo lakhe, sizigusha zesandla sakhe. 8 Namhla ukuba ninokuliva izwi lakhe, musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu: njengomhla wempikiswano, mini nandilingayo entlango; 9 Oko bandilingayo ooyihlo: bandicikida, bayibona imisebenzi yam. 10 Iminyaka emashumi mane ndarhuquka sesisizukuIwana, ndathi: Ngabantu abaphambukayo ngeentliziyo, abazazi iindlela zam; 11 Ndada ndabafungela ndinomsindo, ndathi: abasayi kungena ekuphumleni kwam. 1 Uzuko kuYise nakuNyana: nakuMoya oyiNgcwele; 2 Kwavela kunjalo kusenjalo nanamhla: kohlala kunjalo ngonaphakade. Amen

en: Benedictus
en_context: Ingoma kaZekariya (10) + Gloria (2)
xh: 1 Mayibongwe iNkosi uThixo kaSirayeli: ngokuba ibavelele yabakhulula ngentlawulelo abantu bayo. 2 Yasiphakamisela uphondo Iosindiso: endlwini kaDavide umkhonzi wayo. 3 Njengoko yathethayo ngomlomo wabangcwele, ababengabaprofite bayo kwasephakadeni: 3.5 usindiso lokusisindisa ezintshabeni zethu, nasesandleni sabo bonke abo abasithiyayo. 4 Ukubenzela inceba oobawo bethu: nokukhumbula umnqophiso wayo ongcwele. 5 Isifungo eyasifungela uAbraham ubawo wethu: sokusinika ukuba sithi sihlangulwe esandleni seentshaba zethu.6 Siyikhonze singenakoyika: ngobungcwele nangobulungisa emehlweni ayo yonke imihla yobomi bethu. 7 Nawe mntwana, uya kubizwa ngokuba ungumprofite wosenyangweni: kuba uya kuhamba phambi kobuso beNkosi ulungise iindlela zayo. 8 Ukuze ubanike abantu bayo ukwaziwa kosindiso: ngoxolelo Iwezono zabo. 9 Ngenxa yenceba nemfesane yoThixo wethu: Othe ngaye wasivelela umso wasenyangweni. 10 Ukuba ukhanye kwabo bahleliyo ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa: nokuba uzingenise iinyawo zethu endleleni yoxolo. 1 Uzuko kuYise nakuNyana: nakuMoya oyiNgcwele; 2 Kwavela kunjalo kusenjalo nanamhla: kohlala kunjalo ngonaphakade. Amen
